Head: Crushing feeling in vertex
WEIGHT ON VERTEX; ACHING AND BURNING IN TEMPLES AND ABOVE EYES
Vertigo, dizzy when lying down
Female: PAIN IN MILK DUCTS; intolerable between nursing
Eyes: Headache; involving nerves going to eye
Ciliary neuralgia; worse any attempt to use eyes: burning in eyes

name: Phellandrium
details: The respiratory symptoms are most important, and have been frequently verified clinically. A very good remedy for the OFFENSIVE EXPECTORATION AND COUGH IN PHTHISIS, bronchitis, and emphysema. Tuberculosis, affecting generally the middle lobes. EVERYTHING TASTES SWEET. Hemoptysis, hectic and colliquative diarrhoea.
